document_data.name: Par's house
document_data.mainbody: '''Par's house''' was a house in the [[Mere of Dead Men]].
document_data.Location: Par's house was located near [[Edario]]'s forge.
document_data.Structure: Like the other houses in Highcliff, Par's house was made from stone, wood and straw.
document_data.Interior: The interior of the house is nicely made, with luxurious drawers, carpets, tables and other furniture. In addition, the containers hold gems, potions, gold etc.
document_data.History: Par asked of the [[Kalach-Cha]] to enter his house and see what is inside. The Kalach-Cha would encounter some angry sailors, led by [[Dulahey]], who would attack. After the situation has been taken care of, Par would give away some potions and enter his house to clean the mess up.
